name: Community Block Party
venue: Palace Theatre Albany, 19 Clinton Ave, Albany, NY 12207
description: A free family-friendly event featuring fun activities and community engagement outside the Palace Theatre in Downtown Albany.

name: The Little Mermaid - Free Movie
venue: Palace Theatre Albany, 19 Clinton Ave, Albany, NY 12207
description: Enjoy a free screening of Disney's The Little Mermaid as part of the Summer in the City series. Doors open at noon for family activities, movie starts at 1:00 PM.

name: Brad Williams: The Growth Spurt Tour 2025
venue: Palace Theatre Albany, 19 Clinton Ave, Albany, NY 12207
description: Comedian Brad Williams brings his hilarious stand-up comedy show to Albany as part of his 2025 tour.

name: The American Revolution: An Evening with Ken Burns
venue: Palace Theatre Albany, 19 Clinton Ave, Albany, NY 12207
description: Join award-winning filmmaker Ken Burns for a special preview of his upcoming film, The American Revolution, with clips and stories from the 8-year project.

name: Pro Musica on Broadway
venue: The Egg, Empire State Plaza, Albany, NY 12220
description: Albany Pro Musica closes its 2024-25 season with a tribute to Broadway, featuring favorite showtunes performed by chorus, ensembles, and soloists in the Hart Theatre.

name: The Jinkx & DeLa Holiday Show
venue: The Egg, Empire State Plaza, Albany, NY 12220
description: Experience a brand new edition of the internationally acclaimed holiday show by 'The Queens of Christmas,' featuring comedy, new songs, and annual favorites.
